ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] My 30 day free trial.
ygData.msgSnippet: You put in your card # but you aren t charged until after the 30 days is up. So, you can cancel anytime you like within the 30 days and not be charged. No
ygData.messageBody:
You put in your card # but you aren't charged until after the 30 days is
up.
So, you can cancel anytime you like within the 30 days and not be
charged. No worries.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Ruppel [mailto:mind_of_conspiracy@...]
Sent: Sunday, September 07, 2003 10:08 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] My 30 day free trial.

I recently purchased Everquest Evolution. I want to use my 30 day
trial, but it says i need either a credit card or a game card to do
anything. I don't really want to pay for a subscription when i
could just use the free trial.




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
